mapper.insert:
insert into movie (id, mv_name, mv_type, mv_area, mv_year, create_time, update_time, update_info, description, actor_list, director_list, state, picture, screen_picture, score) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.mvName}, #{item.mvType}, #{item.mvArea}, #{item.mvYear}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.updateInfo}, #{item.description}, #{item.actorList}, #{item.directorList}, 1, #{item.picture}, null, #{item.score})
mapper.select: select id movieId, mv_name mvName, update_info updateInfo, picture picture, actor_list actorList, score score from movie

select mv.id, mv.mv_name mvName, mv.mv_type mvType, mc.name mvTypeName, mv.mv_area mvArea, mv.mv_year mvYear, mv.update_time updateTime, mv.update_info updateInfo, mv.description description, mv.actor_list actorList, mv.director_list directorList, mv.picture picture, mv.score score from movie mv left join movie_class mc on mv.mv_type=mc.id where mv.state=1 and mv.id=#{id}
